text: María Carrillo Moreno (14 October 1919 - 31 July 2009) better known as Mary Carrillo was a Spanish actress. She appeared in more than fifty films from 1937 to 2002. ==Selected filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year ! Title !
